field.name: help
field.p: Click to create Template for Purchase Order.
The Template contains the history of the discussion/negociation you had with your supplier.

tree.colors: blue:state == 'draft';grey:state == 'done';red:state not in ('cancel', 'done') and date < current_date

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create an incoming shipment.
The Incoming Shipments is the list of all orders you will receive from your suppliers. An incoming shipment contains a list of products to be received according to the original purchase order.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a stock movement.
This menu gives you the full traceability of inventory operations on a specific product. You can filter on the product to see all the past or future movements for the product.

filter.name: draft
filter.help: Purchase orders which are in draft state

filter.name: exception
filter.help: Purchase orders which are in exception state

filter.name: not_invoiced
filter.help: Purchase orders that include lines not invoiced.

record.field: Series/Supplier Wise Analysis allows you to easily check and analyse your Contract.

filter.name: draft
filter.help: Purchase orders which are in draft state

filter.name: exception
filter.help: Purchase orders which are in exception state
